title: NFL Week 2 Fantasy/DFS Advice, Breakdown (Football 9/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Heath Cummings and Bryant McFadden to break down all fantasy things you need to know entering Week 2. The guys react to news of another injury for Chargers TE Hunter Henry (2:00) before sharing how to approach Antonio Brown from a fantasy perspective (10:00). Heath discusses the biggest thing he learned in Week 1 (15:00), while BMac details his thoughts on David Johnson and the Cardinals offense (18:00), and the Chiefs options without Tyreek Hill (23:00). We get best 'stashes' from Heath before diving into a Week 2 matchup breakdown (33:00) and top DFS plays (40:00). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
